game.name: Star Boss
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Become a big pilot of a tiny spaceship. Fight bigger opponents and prove that size does not matter. Exploit weaknesses of opponents. Get the edge thanks to the range of super weapons.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a big pilot of a tiny spaceship. Fight bigger opponents and prove that size does not matter. Exploit weaknesses of opponents. Get the edge thanks to the range of super weapons.
